citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, records required by the AWA including the program of vet care, contingency plan and
disposition records could not be located to be reviewed. These records must be maintained and made available for
APHIS inspectors to assure compliance with specific regulations.
Correct by: Oct 21, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of the inspection, records required by the AWA including the program of vet care, contingency plan and 
disposition records could not be located to be reviewed. These records must be maintained and made available for 
APHIS inspectors to assure compliance with specific regulations. 
Correct by: Oct 21, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
